    • Class it.polimi.ingsw.model.Message

      class Message extends Object implements Serializable

      • Serialized Fields

        • author
          String author
          Author of the message
        • recipient
          String recipient
          Specific recipient if any, an empty string is the default for a public message
        • text
          String text
          Original plain text typed by the player
        • time
          LocalTime time
          Time of the creation of the message

    • Class it.polimi.ingsw.model.Player

      class Player extends Object implements Serializable

      • Serialized Fields

        • area
          Playground area
          Playground where the player place their own cards
        • color
          Color color
          Color of the pawn of the player
        • hand
          ArrayList<Card> hand
          ArrayList of cards the player has in their hand (less or equal than 3)
        • lastCardPlaced
          Card lastCardPlaced
          Last card placed by the player, used to reset their last valid values when they disconnect before drawing a card
        • name
          String name
          Name of the player
        • online
          boolean online
          Indicates if a player is currently online or not, used to edit their values if they disconnect in specific phases of the gameplay
        • points
          int points
          Current amount of points the player has
        • pointsFromLastCard
          int pointsFromLastCard
          Last points the player obtained placing a card, used to reset their last valid values when they disconnect before drawing a card
        • secretAchievement
          ArrayList<AchievementCard> secretAchievement
          Secret achievements of the player, initially two, decreased to 1 after the choice
        • winner
          boolean winner
          Indicates if the player is a winner or not, used at the end of the game

    • Class it.polimi.ingsw.model.Playground

      class Playground extends Object implements Serializable

      • Serialized Fields

        • eastBound
          int eastBound
          Highest column where a card is placed / easternmost x
        • items
          Map<Item,Integer> items
          Amount of every single item currently available on the playground
        • northBound
          int northBound
          Lowest row where a card is placed / northernmost y
        • orderedCoords
          LinkedHashMap<Card,int[]> orderedCoords
          Ordered map used to retrieve the coordinates of a placed card and the order they've been placed, used by the graphical application
        • resources
          Map<Resource,Integer> resources
          Amount of every single resource currently available on the playground
        • southBound
          int southBound
          Highest row where a card is placed / southernmost y
        • table
          Space[][] table
          Matrix made of 81*81 spaces, big enough for all possible combinations of cards in a game with the smallest amount of players (2). (0,0) is the top left corner and (80,80) is the bottom right corner
        • westBound
          int westBound
          Lowest column where a card is placed / westernmost x

  • Package it.polimi.ingsw.networking

    • Class it.polimi.ingsw.networking.Client

      class Client extends UnicastRemoteObject implements Serializable

      • Serialized Fields

        • achievements
          ArrayList<AchievementCard> achievements
          List of achievement cards held by the client's player. The first element is the secret achievement.
        • allPlayers
          ArrayList<Player> allPlayers
          List of all players currently in the game.
        • choosableAchievements
          ArrayList<AchievementCard> choosableAchievements
          List of achievement cards available for choice by the client's player.
        • clientActionsToSend
          BlockingQueue<Action> clientActionsToSend
          Queue for actions to be sent to the server.
        • commonGold
          ArrayList<GoldCard> commonGold
          List of gold cards on the table, available to all players.
        • commonResource
          ArrayList<ResourceCard> commonResource
          List of resource cards on the table, available to all players.
        • connected
          boolean connected
          Flag indicating if the client is connected to the server (online).
        • connectionFlagClient
          boolean connectionFlagClient
          Flag indicating the connection status with the server (client side).
        • connectionFlagServer
          boolean connectionFlagServer
          Flag indicating the connection status with the server (server side).
        • goldDeck
          Resource goldDeck
          Deck of gold cards used in the game, represents the resource of the first gold card on top of the gold deck.
        • gui
          boolean gui
          Flag indicating whether the client is using a GUI.
        • guiView
          GUIView guiView
          Reference to the GUI view object.
        • loginController
          LoginController loginController
          Reference to the login controller object (GUI).
        • nickname
          String nickname
          Nickname chosen by the client for identification.
        • p
          Player p
          Player object representing the client's player in the game.
        • playController
          PlayController playController
          Reference to the play controller object (GUI).
        • resourceDeck
          Resource resourceDeck
          Deck of resource cards used in the game, represents the resource of the first resource card on top of the resource deck.
        • server
          VirtualServer server
          Reference to the remote server object.
        • serverActionsReceived
          BlockingQueue<Action> serverActionsReceived
          Queue for actions received from the server.
        • starterCard
          StarterCard starterCard
          Starter card assigned to the client's player.
        • startWaitRoutine
          boolean startWaitRoutine
          Flag indicating if the client is in wait routine.
        • state
          it.polimi.ingsw.networking.Client.State state
          Current state of the client in the game state machine.
        • threadAchievementListener
          Thread threadAchievementListener
          Threads used for different GUI purposes
        • threadChatListener
          Thread threadChatListener
          Threads used for different GUI purposes
        • threadDrawListener
          Thread threadDrawListener
          Threads used for different GUI purposes
        • threadPlaceListener
          Thread threadPlaceListener
          Threads used for different GUI purposes
        • threadRePlaceListener
          Thread threadRePlaceListener
          Threads used for different GUI purposes
        • threadStartListener
          Thread threadStartListener
          Threads used for different GUI purposes
        • wait
          boolean wait
          Flag indicating if the client is waiting.
